articles.author: Ian Randall
articles.title: Aurora breakthrough: ‘Never-before-recorded’ red arc activity seen above New Zealand - Express
articles.description: A NEVER-BEFORE-RECORDED red auroral-like arc transformation was recorded in the skies above New Zealand's South Island, a study has reported.

articles.title: Dark Matter May Not Exist: These Physicists Favor of a New Theory of Gravity - SciTechDaily

articles.title: Japanese Team Invents Moon Base With Artificial Gravity - Futurism
articles.description: Japanese researchers say we'll probably need their newly designed Moon base with artificial gravity if humans are going to live on the Moon.
articles.content:
